languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас качает головой.{/n} "Ужасная весть... Прискорбно, что {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальный мир{/g} со столь колоссальными мощностями подвергся тлетворному влиянию Архиврага. Возможно, мои... коллеги сумеют взять следы культистов, теряющиеся в холодной пустоте. Конечно, в этом мало утешения для всех нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ахиллеас качает головой.{/n} "Ужасная весть... Прискорбно, что индустриальный мир со столь колоссальными мощностями подвергся тлетворному влиянию Архиврага. Возможно, мои... коллеги сумеют взять следы культистов, теряющиеся в холодной пустоте. Конечно, в этом мало утешения для всех нас".

languages.text: {n}Achilleas shakes his head.{/n} "These are grim tidings... It's a tragedy that an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of such tremendous capacity was brought down by the pernicious influence of the Archenemy. Perhaps my... colleagues can pick up the cultists' trail in the cold void. Of course, it would be a small consolation to all of us."

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯摇了摇头。{/n}“这真是个糟糕的消息……一个产能如此强大的{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}，被混沌大敌的邪恶影响摧毁了。或许我的……同事们会在寒冷的虚空中找到邪教分子的踪迹。如果真的能找到，相信这对我们所有人而言，都会是个小小的慰藉。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas shakes his head.{/n} "These are grim tidings... It's a tragedy that an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of such tremendous capacity was brought down by the pernicious influence of the Archenemy. Perhaps my... colleagues can pick up the cultists' trail in the cold void. Of course, it would be a small consolation to all of us."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯摇了摇头。{/n}“这真是个糟糕的消息……一个产能如此强大的{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}，被混沌大敌的邪恶影响摧毁了。或许我的……同事们会在寒冷的虚空中找到邪教分子的踪迹。如果真的能找到，相信这对我们所有人而言，都会是个小小的慰藉。”

languages.text: {n}Achilleas niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Son malas noticias... Es una tragedia que un {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} de tanta importancia haya caído ante el influjo del Archienemigo. Tal vez mis... colegas puedan encontrar el rastro del culto en el vacío. Aunque sería parco consuelo».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas shakes his head.{/n} "These are grim tidings... It's a tragedy that an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of such tremendous capacity was brought down by the pernicious influence of the Archenemy. Perhaps my... colleagues can pick up the cultists' trail in the cold void. Of course, it would be a small consolation to all of us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Son malas noticias... Es una tragedia que un {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} de tanta importancia haya caído ante el influjo del Archienemigo. Tal vez mis... colegas puedan encontrar el rastro del culto en el vacío. Aunque sería parco consuelo».

languages.text: {n}アキレアスは首を振る。{/n}「なんという知らせでしょう…あれほど生産性の高い{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}が、悪意に満ちた渾沌の勢力の影響下に堕ちるとはまさに悲劇です。おそらく私の…同僚が、冷たいヴォイドの中で信者どもを片付けることになります。もちろん、私達の誰にとってもわずかな気休めにしかなりませんが」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas shakes his head.{/n} "These are grim tidings... It's a tragedy that an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of such tremendous capacity was brought down by the pernicious influence of the Archenemy. Perhaps my... colleagues can pick up the cultists' trail in the cold void. Of course, it would be a small consolation to all of us."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスは首を振る。{/n}「なんという知らせでしょう…あれほど生産性の高い{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}が、悪意に満ちた渾沌の勢力の影響下に堕ちるとはまさに悲劇です。おそらく私の…同僚が、冷たいヴォイドの中で信者どもを片付けることになります。もちろん、私達の誰にとってもわずかな気休めにしかなりませんが」

languages.text: {n}Achilleas schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Das sind schlechte Nachrichten ... Es ist eine Tragödie, dass eine {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} mit derartiger Kapazität durch den schädlichen Einfluss des Erzfeinds zu Boden gezwungen wurde. Vielleicht ... können meine Kollegen in der kalten Leere die Spur der Kultisten aufnehmen. Natürlich wäre das für uns alle nur ein kleiner Trost."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas shakes his head.{/n} "These are grim tidings... It's a tragedy that an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of such tremendous capacity was brought down by the pernicious influence of the Archenemy. Perhaps my... colleagues can pick up the cultists' trail in the cold void. Of course, it would be a small consolation to all of us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Das sind schlechte Nachrichten ... Es ist eine Tragödie, dass eine {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} mit derartiger Kapazität durch den schädlichen Einfluss der Erzfeindin zu Boden gezwungen wurde. Vielleicht ... können meine Kollegen in der kalten Leere die Spur der Kultisten aufnehmen. Natürlich wäre das für uns alle nur ein kleiner Trost."

languages.text: « Voilà une bien triste nouvelle, {n}déplore Achilleas en secouant la tête.{/n} Quelle tragédie de voir un {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} avec tant de potentiel sombrer sous l'influence pernicieuse du Grand Ennemi. Mes... collègues parviendront peut-être à retrouver la trace de ces fanatiques dans le vide glacial. À défaut de mieux... »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas shakes his head.{/n} "These are grim tidings... It's a tragedy that an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of such tremendous capacity was brought down by the pernicious influence of the Archenemy. Perhaps my... colleagues can pick up the cultists' trail in the cold void. Of course, it would be a small consolation to all of us."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà une bien triste nouvelle, {n}déplore Achilleas en secouant la tête.{/n} Quelle tragédie de voir un {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} avec tant de potentiel sombrer sous l'influence pernicieuse du Grand Ennemi. Mes... collègues parviendront peut-être à retrouver la trace de ces fanatiques dans le vide glacial. À défaut de mieux... »

languages.text: {n}Achilleas başını sallıyor.{/n} "Can sıkıcı bir haber. Böylesi muazzam bir kapasiteye sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünyanın{/g}, Şerbaşı'nın habis nüfuzu yüzünden bertaraf olması büyük bir trajedi. Belki bazı dostlarım, uçsuzun soğukluğunda tarikatçıların izini bulabilir. Tabii bu, olsa olsa hepimizin için küçük bir teselli olur."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas shakes his head.{/n} "These are grim tidings... It's a tragedy that an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of such tremendous capacity was brought down by the pernicious influence of the Archenemy. Perhaps my... colleagues can pick up the cultists' trail in the cold void. Of course, it would be a small consolation to all of us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas başını sallıyor.{/n} "Can sıkıcı haberler. Böylesi muazzam bir kapasiteye sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünya{/g}nın Şerbaşı'nın habis nüfuzu nedeniyle bertaraf olması büyük bir trajedi. Belki uçsuzun soğukluğunda tarikatçıların izini bulabilecek bazı dostlarım olabilir ama elbette bu da hepimizin için küçük bir teselli olur yalnızca."
